entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
